name: Idle Bus For Hope
description:
First Exit Productions recently uncovered plans for an idle game spinoff to classic Sega CD game Desert Bus. In just a day, a new experience was born. Perfectly faithful both to those plans and the original game, Idle Bus For Hope contains literally days worth of fun. With an intuitive upgrade systems, and an incredible rebirth and prestige implementation, this is where it is at.

Critics have called it:

  • A video game.
